thread.title_full: Listen to Frank Ocean, Calvin Harris, Migos’ New Song “Slide” | Pitchfork

title: Listen to Frank Ocean, Calvin Harris, Migos’ New Song “Slide” | Pitchfork
text:
Listen to Frank Ocean, Calvin Harris, Migos’ New Song “Slide” Frank Ocean “appears courtesy of Frank Ocean” Frank Ocean Frank: Photo by Jeff Kravitz/FilmMagic Calvin: Photo by Cooper Neill/Getty Images for iHeartMedia Migos: PrinceWilliams/Wireimage 
Frank Ocean , Calvin Harris , and Migos have released their new song . Listen to “Slide” below. After teasing the track multiple times on his Snapchat story, Harris finally officially announced the song earlier this week, tweeting out the full credits for the song along with a list of the instruments used to create it. Ocean notably “appears courtesy of Frank Ocean,” further confirming his status as an unsigned artist following the release of his last studio album, Blonde , under his own company Boys Don’t Cry. “Slide” marks the first new piece of music from Ocean since the release of Blonde last year. CALVIN HARRIS // FRANK OCEAN // MIGOS pic.twitter.com/UvsJzm9F6k — Calvin Harris (@CalvinHarris) February 21, 2017 Artists In This Story
